alert.note: Alert for Coastal Onslow; West Carteret (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued January 02 at 4:43PM EST until January 03 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO NOON EST MONDAY... * WHAT...One to two feet of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Areas along Bogue Sound, the Newport and White Oak Rivers, and adjacent tidal creeks, and areas in North Topsail Beach, the lower New River, and adjacent tidal creeks. * WHEN...From 6 AM to noon EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Up to 1 to 2 of inundation above ground level is possible in some areas near shorelines and tidal waterways resulting in an elevated threat of property damage. Flooding will extend inland from the waterfront threatening some homes and businesses. Numerous road closures and flooding of vehicles will be possible. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Beaufort Marine Lab NC MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 5.5 ft, Major 6.5 ft MHHW Categories - Minor -0.8 ft, Moderate -0.3 ft, Major 0.7 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 02/08 PM 3.8 -2.0 1.2 2 None 03/08 AM 6.0 0.2 2.0 2-3 Moderate 03/09 PM 3.9 -1.9 1.2 0 None 04/09 AM 6.2 0.4 2.3 0 Moderate 04/10 PM 4.6 -1.2 1.9 0 None 05/10 AM 5.5 -0.3 1.8 0 Moderate &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.
